properties.areaDesc: Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 8:35PM AST until January 8 at 8:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED ACROSS THE ATLANTIC WATERS...

.A subsiding northwesterly swell will continue to result in
hazardous seas overnight.

* WHAT...Seas between 5 and 7 feet.

* WHERE...Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from 10 NM to
19.5N.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM AST WEDNESDAY
